question: Government of __________ and NITI Aayog organised a health sector reforms workshop.
explanation: The Department of Health and Family Welfare, Government of Assam and NITI Aayog organised a health sector reforms workshop, in Guwahati. SATH- Sustainable Action for Transforming Human Capital Programme was launched in this occasion. This programme is a joint initiative of Government of Assam and NITI Aayog.
